Prompts: I’m feeling anxious all the time and I don’t know what to do.
I think I am going to fail my exam and now I feel worthless.
I feel like my parents don’t love me anymore.
I haven’t been sleeping well because I’m overthinking everything.
I feel empty inside even when everything in my life seems to be going on fine.
I want to do better but I have feel like I have zero motivation.
I feel like nobody actually cares about me.
I think it’ll be better if I just give up.
All of this stress is making me want to pull out my hair.
I don’t think I have any purpose in life.
